scripts.build:gh: REPO=$(basename -s .git `git config --get remote.origin.url`); NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH="${NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH:-/$REPO}" next build && cp out/index.html out/404.html && touch out/.nojekyll && rm -rf docs && cp -R out docs
scripts.deploy: REPO=$(basename -s .git `git config --get remote.origin.url`); NEXT_PUBLIC_BASE_PATH="/${REPO}" next build && cp out/index.html out/404.html && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out -t true
